Luxury Appliance Repair in Encino, CA

White-Glove Service for Homes That Demand the Best

Encino is where tranquility meets luxury—known for its gated estates, modern hillside homes, and high-end amenities tucked into the heart of the San Fernando Valley. Your appliances aren’t just tools—they’re part of the lifestyle. Brands like Sub-Zero, Wolf, Thermador, Miele, La Cornue, Gaggenau, and Viking were chosen not just for looks, but for performance.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we deliver expert high-end appliance repair in Encino, combining brand-specific training, genuine parts, and white-glove service trusted by the area’s most refined homeowners.

🔧 Why Encino Residents Choose ZARICCI

  • ✅ Experts in Premium Appliance Brands
    From smart ovens to integrated refrigeration and professional-grade cooktops, we’re factory-certified to repair elite brands with accuracy, discretion, and care.
  • ✅ Only Genuine Manufacturer Parts
    We use OEM parts to protect your appliance’s performance and longevity—and to maintain your warranty where applicable.
  • ✅ Same-Day or Next-Day Appointments in Encino
    Your time is valuable. We offer fast service to Encino and surrounding areas, always arriving on time and ready to work.
  • ✅ White-Glove, In-Home Service
    We wear protective gear, work cleanly, and respect your home and privacy. From the moment we enter, you’ll know you’re working with professionals.

🛠️ What We Repair in Encino

❄️ Refrigerators & Freezers

  • Sub-Zero, Thermador, Miele
  • Not cooling or inconsistent temperatures
  • Ice maker/water dispenser not working
  • Leaks, strange noises, or panel issues

🔥 Ovens, Ranges & Cooktops

  • Wolf, La Cornue, Gaggenau, Viking
  • Burners not igniting
  • Oven heating unevenly or not at all
  • Smart control or self-cleaning issues
  • Induction zones not responding

🚿 Dishwashers

  • Miele, Bosch, Cove
  • Won’t start or complete cycle
  • Poor cleaning or drying
  • Water leaks or error codes

🧺 Washing Machines & Dryers

  • Miele, LG Signature, Fisher & Paykel
  • Not draining or spinning
  • Dryer not heating or overheating
  • Control panel or smart sensor failures

☕ Specialty Appliances

  • Built-in espresso machines, wine coolers, warming drawers, and speed ovens
  • Temperature inconsistencies
  • Internal motor or heating issues
  • Smart app or connectivity problems

👨‍💻 Our Signature Repair Process

  1. Easy Scheduling
    Call or book online. We’ll coordinate a time that suits your routine and the needs of your property.
  2. On-Time Arrival & Diagnosis
    Your certified technician arrives on time, professionally dressed, and ready to assess your appliance.
  3. Detailed Estimate
    We walk you through the issue and provide a clear, upfront quote—no hidden costs or surprises.
  4. Precision Repair with OEM Parts
    We use only brand-approved parts and test every function after the repair is complete.
  5. Clean-Up & Warranty Backing
    We leave your home just as we found it—only with your appliance fully functional—and we guarantee our work.
